Start Turning Payments into Profits
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for visiting the Wright Express booth at the 2012 NACUBO annual meeting in National Harbor, MD. Wright Express offers a suite of payment solutions to meet your campus' unique needs. We are committed to identifying cost-savings effeciencies and are focused on delivering 'best-in-class' solutions. We'll take on the projects your traditional bank won't touch.
Why choose Wright Express?
There are two important points of differentiation between Wright Express and traditional banks.
· Our B2B focused industrial bank allows us to concentrate on specialized solutions that cater to the unique needs of businesses and institutions, as opposed to other banks that have a split focus on consumers and businesses.
· We focus exclusively on corporate payment solutions and do not offer deposit accounts or treasury services. This specialized focus gives us the opportunity to devote our resources to best-in-class solutions whereas our competitors tend to cross- or up-sell payment solutions as an add-on to treasury services.
I'd like to share with you a benchmark report on ePayments within higher education and a case study of an ePayment implementation that had a positive impact on a campus' internal effeciencies and provided an additional source of revenue. This no-cost solution simply interfaced with the campus' existing ERP system for vendor payments.
I will follow up with a phone call to see about scheduling an initial discovery session. In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact me with questions.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
